context: A potentially malicious URL click was detected involving user Ethan Brooks who clicked on the URL `https://ac27145722.livelygrass-8d4c4013.eastus2.azurecontainerapps.io/`. The email associated with Ethan Brooks is `Ethan Brooks@vnevado.alpineskihouse.co`, and the mail was sent to `tgs2z@vnevado.alpineskihouse.co`. This incident is part of a broader security incident.
question: As part of the same incident, a known credential theft tool execution was detected. What was the IP address involved in this credential theft tool execution?
solution_steps: A user with AadUserId `1d94aaf6-efe6-4e76-ad56-ffd7d1257bc1` clicked on a malicious URL.
A known credential theft tool execution was detected from IP address `65.233.23.156`.
